summary: The entire squad of gendarmes from Saint-Tropez has been retired. But there is no such power that could stop them from protecting the law and public order.
cast: Louis de Funès|Jean Lefebvre|Guy Grosso|Michel Modo|Nicole Vervil|France Rumilly|Yves Vincent|Christian Marin|Claude Gensac|Michel Galabru|Sara Franchetti|Ugo Fangareggi|Christor Georgiadis|Christine Reynolds|René Berthier|Paul Mercey|Henri Guégan|Dominique Zardi|Henri Attal|Jean Valmence|Bernard Charlan|Carlo Nell|Robert Le Béal|Claude Carvin|Laurent Wesman|Maritin|Pierrick Her|Yvan Varco|Michel Herval|Dominique Davray|Paul Préboist|Yves Barsacq|Suzanne Reynolds
title: Seis gendarmes en fuga
